originalText.text:
Their seamstress is amazing. The woman at the front desk is really great and their dry cleaning is alright.

BUT NEVER GET THEIR DELIVERY OPTION. It‚Äôs never on time from when they say it will arrive. They are inconsistent on when they make their deliveries - and expect your clothing to be MIA for a while. It happened once and thought maybe it was a one time thing. But nope - had it done a second time and once again a day later than expected and had to call and beg to get some pieces back.

If you have the patience and the time - they are great - but don‚Äôt take their own deadline for when it‚Äôs going to be delivered seriously. It‚Äôs never accurate.

Again, I think they are a great local spot and don‚Äôt want their business to suffer because of their delivery option. I‚Äôve learned to plan ahead and just go in - in-person.

originalText.text: My boyfriend put somethings here and all of sudden they couldn‚Äôt find his stuff and was given the run around about how it was in ‚Äúanother location‚Äù although it was dropped off there. He also kept saying the other store wasn‚Äôt answering. He needed his things for a very special event and could not go because of this. I find it very hard to believe that he left it in there for 3 weeks and it wasn‚Äôt even ready horrible customer service wouldn‚Äôt recommend to anyone I wish I could give them 0 stars !!!

originalText.text: Unfortunately Evergreen is not recommended. After Trying to charge me 1.00 more per each shirt than their posted price.. they explain they have not changed the sign yet. When asked to honor their posted prices they refuse. Bad customer service... bad policy.

originalText.text: I have what many have called ‚Äúsubstantial man thighs,‚Äù and as a result, I tend to tear out the crotch of every pair of pants I own. All the tailors I‚Äôve found have either done a terrible job and been affordable, or a great job but too expensive.  These guys are the first I‚Äôve found that are both affordable AND do an excellent job. Can‚Äôt thank you enough!
